about_the_game:
Zelter’s adorable pixel-art take on zombie apocalypse is back and it’s here to let you fight for your survival in a new way. In Zombie Zhooter, your team is constantly moving and your guns are blazing. You must make every shot count and survive in the zombie-infested city while fighting for your life.


Features


  • Customize your survivor and try different loadouts for the best survival experience
  • Stay on the move and make use of all of your weapon slots
  • Thin the zombie horde and gather perks that will aid you and your team
  • Unite with friends, survive waves and kill off as many zombies as you can during that time

With challenging gameplay, intuitive controls, and a hauntingly beautiful pixel-art aesthetic, Zombie Zhooter is the ultimate test of your and your team's survival skills. Will you be able to withstand the zombie horde and emerge as the ultimate survivor? Only time will tell. Get ready to fight for your life!

name: Zelter: Zombie Zhooter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: i5-4200u
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 860
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Experience Zelter in a brand-new way! Try pixel-art survival Zombie Zhooter mode together with your friends. Finding yourself isolated in a residential district flooded with zombies, your only choice is to move fast and shoot faster. Fight off the zombies, make use of your arsenal, and stay alive!
